docs.lead_paragraph: Following are excerpts from a Washington news conference yesterday by President Clinton, who announced the appointment of Erskine B. Bowles to replace Leon E. Panetta as the White House chief of staff, as recorded by the Federal News Service, a private transcription service: Before I begin, I'd like to ask the Vice President and Leon Panetta and Erskine Bowles to join me up here. No particular order. (Laughter.)

headline.main: Excerpts From Remarks by Clinton at His Post-Election News Conference

docs.abstract: Excerpts from Pres Clinton's news conference, at which he announced appointment of Erskine B Bowles to replace Leon E Panetta as White House chief of staff, and responded to reporters' queries on variety of issues (L)
